name: A Prestige Tree Mod About Merging
name_original: A Prestige Tree Mod About Merging
description:
Inspired by Scrap Clicker II. A Modding Tree game about merging and prestige layers. Similarly to Game Dev Tree, this mod replaces all vanilla content with new content. 

You can find the source code at https://github.com/AbitofTetration/MergingPrestigeTreeMod.
